snippet: Nine teenagers were missing Friday from a ranch for troubled youths in Sierra County after workers were accused of beating and shackling them.
abstract: Nine teenagers are missing from a ranch for troubled youths in New Mexico after workers are accused of beating and shackling them.
lead_paragraph: Nine teenagers were missing Friday from a ranch for troubled youths in Sierra County after workers were accused of beating and shackling them.

headline.main: New Mexico: Teenagers and Ranch Operators Missing
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Teenagers Reported Missing From Ranch
